verses.verse: My son,<WH1121> keep<WH8104> my words.<WH561> Lay up<WH6845> my commandments within you.<WH4687>
Keep<WH8104> my commandments<WH4687> and live!<WH2421> Guard my teaching<WH8451> as the apple<WH380> of your eye.<WH5869>
Bind<WH7194> them on your fingers.<WH676> Write<WH3789> them on the tablet<WH3871> of your heart.<WH3820>
Tell<WH559> wisdom,<WH2451> "You are my sister.<WH269>" Call<WH7121> understanding<WH2451> your relative,<WH4129>
that they may keep<WH8104> you from the strange<WH2114> woman,<WH802> from the foreigner<WH5237> who flatters<WH2505> with her words.<WH561>
For at the window<WH2474> of my house,<WH1004> I looked<WH8259> out through my lattice.<WH822>
I saw<WH7200> among the simple ones.<WH6612> I discerned<WH995> among the youths<WH1121> a young man<WH5288> void<WH2638> of understanding,<WH3820>
passing through<WH5674> the street<WH7784> near<WH681> her corner,<WH6434> he went<WH6805> the way<WH1870> to her house,<WH1004>
in the twilight,<WH5399> in the evening<WH3117> of the day,<WH380> in the middle of the night<WH3915> and in the darkness.<WH653>
Behold,<WH802> there a woman met<WH7125> him with the attire<WH7897> of a prostitute,<WH2181> and with crafty<WH5341> intent.<WH3820>
She is loud<WH1993> and defiant.<WH5637> Her feet<WH7272> don't<WH7931> stay in her house.<WH1004>
Now<WH6471> she is in the streets,<WH7339> now<WH6471> in the squares,<WH7339> and lurking<WH693> at<WH681> every corner.<WH6438>
So she caught<WH2388> him,<WH5401> and kissed him.<WH5810> With an impudent face<WH6440> she said to him:<WH559>
"Sacrifices of peace<WH8002> offerings<WH2077> are with me.<WH3117> This day I have paid<WH7999> my vows.<WH5088>
Therefore I came out<WH3318> to meet<WH7125> you,<WH7836> to diligently seek your face,<WH6440> and I have found you.<WH4672>
I have spread<WH7234> my couch<WH6210> with carpets<WH4765> of tapestry,<WH2405> with striped cloths of the yarn<WH330> of Egypt.<WH4714>
I have perfumed<WH5130> my bed<WH4904> with myrrh,<WH4753> aloes,<WH174> and cinnamon.<WH7076>
Come,<WH3212> let<WH7301>'s take our fill of loving<WH1730> until the morning.<WH1242> Let<WH5965>'s solace ourselves with loving.<WH159>
For my husband<WH376> isn't<WH1004> at home. He has gone<WH1980> on a long<WH7350> journey.<WH1870>
He has taken<WH3947> a bag<WH6872> of money<WH3701> with him.<WH3027> He will come<WH935> home<WH1004> at the full<WH3117> moon.<WH3677>"
With persuasive<WH7230> words,<WH3948> she led him astray.<WH5186> With the flattering<WH2506> of her lips,<WH8193> she seduced him.<WH5080>
He followed<WH1980> her<WH310> immediately,<WH6597> as an ox<WH7794> goes<WH935> to the slaughter,<WH2874> as a fool<WH191> stepping<WH4148> into a noose.<WH5914>
Until an arrow<WH2671> strikes<WH6398> through his liver,<WH3516> as a bird<WH6833> hurries<WH4116> to the snare,<WH6341> and doesn't<WH3045> know that it will cost his life.<WH5315>
Now therefore,<WH1121> sons, listen<WH8085> to me.<WH7181> Pay attention to the words<WH561> of my mouth.<WH6310>
Don't<WH3820> let your heart turn<WH7847> to her ways.<WH1870> Don't<WH8582> go astray in her paths,<WH5410>
for she has thrown down<WH5307> many<WH7227> wounded.<WH2491> Yes,<WH2026> all her slain are a mighty army.<WH6099>
Her house<WH1004> is the way<WH1870> to Sheol,<WH7585> going down<WH3381> to the rooms<WH2315> of death.<WH4194>
